name: mrbelvedereci
description: A lightweight CI server for Salesforce developers to automate running CumulusCI flows against Github repositories

CONNECTED_APP_CALLBACK_URL.description: The callback url configured for the Connected App.  You should be able to get these values from the command `cumulusci2 org connected_app` in your locally configured instance of CumulusCI

CONNECTED_APP_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of the Salesforce Connected App.  You should be able to get these values from the command `cumulusci2 org connected_app` in your locally configured instance of CumulusCI

CONNECTED_APP_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the Salesforce Connected App. You should be able to get these values from the command `cumulusci2 org connected_app` in your locally configured instance of CumulusCI

DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: Heroku proxies web requests and Django needs to be configured to allow the forwards

DJANGO_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The Amazon Web Services ID used for S3 storage of media

DJANGO_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The Amazon Web Services secret access key used for S3 storage of media

DJANGO_AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME.description: The Amazon Web Services S3 storage bucket name the site should use

DJANGO_ADMIN_URL.description: The url path to the admin section of the site

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: The url path to the admin section of the site

FROM_EMAIL.description: The email address outbound mail should be sent from

GITHUB_USERNAME.description: The Github username used to connect to repositories and create web hooks

GITHUB_PASSWORD.description: The Github password used to connect to repositories and create web hooks.  Using an application token instead of password is recommended

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_BASE_URL.description: The url for handling Github webhooks.  Ex: https://<app-name>.herokuapp.com/webhook/github

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: The url for handling Github webhooks.  Ex: https://<app-name>.herokuapp.com/webhook/github

HIREFIRE_TOKEN.description: The token for integrating with Hirefire.io for auto-scaling worker dynos based on queued/running builds

SFDX_HUB_KEY.description: The private key for the JWT authentication to the devhub for Salesforce DX.  Required to use scratch orgs

SFDX_CLIENT_ID.description: The ClientID of the JWT connected app used for authenticating to the devhub for Salesforce DX.  Required to use scratch orgs

SFDX_HUB_USERNAME.description: The username for the devhub org for Salesforce DX.  Required to use scratch orgs

SITE_URL.description: The base url to the site.  Typically this should be https://<your_app>.herokuapp.com
